title: Earthquakes: A Prequel to Resurrecting Arcadia
description: EARTHQUAKES is an introduction to Arcadia, Missouri where the "fault lines" of three women's lives run deep in three different eras in the hauntingly beautiful --and at times corrupt -- Arcadia Valley. Visit the beautiful Valley in anticipation for the upcoming -to be released- novel RESURRECTING ARCADIA.
author: Melissa Miles McCarter
